mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY userid) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND #{page} * #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into users values(#{userid, jdbcType.VARCHAR}, #{usernm}, #{pass}, sysdate, #{alias}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcode}, #{filename}, #{realFilename})
